messages.title: Personal message from HENRY BELLINGHAM
messages.content: I live in North West Norfolk and all my adult life I have been totally involved in the social and community life of our area. Over the past few years I have met and helped thousands of people and for me, this is both the most rewarding and enjoyable part of my job. At the same time, I have campaigned passionately on behalf of our area in Parliament. I’ve also secured major victories for local campaigners and have worked tirelessly for local businesses and voluntary groups. In fact, during the last Parliament, I had more recorded votes in the House of Commons than any other local Member of Parliament.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Helping secure new high-quality jobs for our towns and villages.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Supporting our local QEHB, GP services and Care sector
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting for better integration of the NHS and Social Care funding.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Giving young people a much brighter future with improved skills training and apprenticeships

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Including further upgrades to our rail services, the A47, mobile phone signals, and broadband.
Have helped make them stronger and done so much to combat our communities' support services.
To deliver more affordable housing for either rent or shared equity.
That delivers new affordable housing, but does not compromise our precious countryside and local infrastructure.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Ensuring that Brexit delivers new opportunities
keyPolicies.policyDescription: For both business and residents across West Norfolk.

issues.brexitEurope: Ensuring that Brexit delivers new opportunities for both business and residents across West Norfolk.
issues.defence: Strongly believes in retaining our independent nuclear deterrent as well as maintaining current levels of Defence expenditure.
issues.education: Giving young people a much brighter future with improved skills training and apprenticeships.
issues.environment: Supporting sustainable development that delivers new affordable housing, but does not compromise our precious countryside and local infrastructure.
issues.health: Supporting our local QEHB, GP services and Care sector. Fighting for better integration of the NHS and Social Care funding.
issues.lawCrime: Supporting our local Police. Helping make them stronger and combatting our communities' support services.
issues.transport: Securing a better infrastructure, including further upgrades to our rail services, the A47, mobile phone signals, and broadband.

community.content: Supporting Housing Associations to deliver more affordable housing for either rent or shared equity.

politicalExperience.achievements: Led the successful All-Party campaign to defeat the wretched incinerator. Has one of the best expenses records of any current MP. Has consistently campaigned for the increases in the Personal Tax Free Allowance which has benefited over 15,000.

contactInformation.address: Shirely House, 23 London Street, Swaffham, Norfolk, PE37 7 DD

examples: During the last Parliament, I had more recorded votes in the House of Commons than any other local Member of Parliament.

Over the past few years I have met and helped thousands of people and for me, this is both the most rewarding and enjoyable part of my job.
